name: Offworld Mercenary Arsenal Interactive Showcase Demo
name_original: Offworld Mercenary Arsenal Interactive Showcase Demo
description:
This web demo shows the entire Offworld Mercenary Arsenal game-ready asset series as an interactive experience. See the guns equipped on animated Mercenary characters.

You can scroll with WASD, rotate with QE and turn on dark mode with R. The on-screen buttons can be pressed on with a mouse too.

--

Visit my author page to buy these assets for your projects!
